Text: The U.S. should also take immediate action to reject Putin‚Äôs claims on Ukraine‚Äôs territory, work with our allies to deter further aggression and impose powerful sanctions now. (3/3)

We need to unleash America‚Äôs energy potential to help Europe free itself of Russian energy dependence. We should make it clear that Nord Stream 2 will not become operational and take steps to facilitate more U.S. natural gas exports to Europe. (2/3)

Russia‚Äôs further invasion of Ukraine is the latest in a long series of steps Putin has taken to subvert Europe‚Äôs peace and security. It is clear that Putin will continue to act aggressively unless we impose heavy costs for his actions. (1/3)
